00008 static int GetFlashStatus32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *Status)
00009 {
00010     int res = 0;
00011     uint32_t reg32;
00012 
00013 
00014         // Enable flash
00015     res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle,Flash->Sel_Flash,Flash->FlashEnable);
00016         // Status read Command
00017         res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, STATUS_READ_CMD);
00018         // Status read
00019         res |= CAENComm_Read32(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, &reg32);
00020         // Disable flash 
00021         res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00022         *Status = (uint8_t)(reg32 & 0xFF);
00023 
00024     return res;
00025 
00026 }

00028 static int GetFlashStatus16(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *Status)
00029 {
00030     int res = 0;
00031     uint16_t reg16;
00032 
00033 
00034         // Enable flash
00035     res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle,Flash->Sel_Flash,Flash->FlashEnable);
00036         // Status read Command
00037         res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, STATUS_READ_CMD);
00038         // Status read
00039         res |= CAENComm_Read16(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, &reg16);
00040         // Disable flash 
00041         res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00042         *Status = (uint8_t)(reg16 & 0xFF);
00043 
00044     return res;
00045 
00046 }
00047 
00048 // *****************************************************************************
00049 // GetFlashStatus: read the status register of the flash
00050 // Parameters: Status: pointer to the Status variable
00051 // Return: 0 on Success, < 0 on error
00052 // *****************************************************************************
00053 static int GetFlashStatus(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *Status) {
00054 
00055   int ret;
00056 
00057   if (Flash->RegSize == 4)
00058     ret = GetFlashStatus32(Flash, Status);
00059   else if (Flash->RegSize == 2)
00060     ret = GetFlashStatus16(Flash, Status); 
00061   else
00062     ret = CvUpgrade_FileAccessError; /* Unsupported RegSize */
00063 
00064   return ret;    
00065     
00066 }

00069 static int WriteFlashPage32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum)
00070 {
00071     unsigned int i;
00072     int res = 0;
00073     uint8_t stat;
00074     uint32_t flash_addr;
00075 
00076     int wcnt = 0;
00077 
00078     uint32_t Wbuff[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];        // Buffers for the Multi Read/Write
00079     uint32_t Addrs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00080     CAENComm_ErrorCode ECs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00081 
00082         if (Flash->PageSize == 264)  // 4 and 8 Mbit
00083                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 9;
00084         else if (Flash->PageSize == 528)  // 16 and 32 Mbit
00085                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 10;
00086         else  // 64 Mbit
00087                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 11;
00088 
00089         // Enable flash 
00090     res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00091 
00092     // Opcode
00093     Wbuff[wcnt] = MAIN_MEM_PAGE_PROG_TH_BUF1_CMD;
00094     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00095     ++wcnt;
00096         // Page address
00097     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>16) & 0xFF;
00098     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00099     ++wcnt;
00100     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>8) & 0xFF;
00101     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00102     ++wcnt;
00103     Wbuff[wcnt] = flash_addr & 0xFF;
00104     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00105     ++wcnt;
00106 
00107     // Fill buffer
00108     for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++) {
00109         Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00110         Wbuff[wcnt] = (uint32_t)data[i];
00111         ++wcnt;
00112     }
00113 
00114     // Write Flash Page
00115     res |= CAENComm_MultiWrite32(Flash->Handle, Addrs, wcnt, Wbuff, ECs);
00116 
00117     // Disable flash 
00118         res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00119 
00120     // wait for Tep (Time of erase and programming)
00121         do 
00122                 res |= GetFlashStatus(Flash, &stat);
00123         while (!(stat & 0x80));
00124 
00125     return res;
00126 }
00127

00180         do 
00181                 res |= GetFlashStatus(Flash, &stat);
00182         while (!(stat & 0x80));
00183 
00184     return res;

00188 static int ReadFlashPage32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum)
00189 {
00190     unsigned int i;
00191     int res = 0;
00192     uint32_t flash_addr;
00193     uint32_t Wbuff[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];        // Buffers for the Multi Read/Write
00194     uint32_t Addrs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00195     uint32_t Rbuff[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00196     CAENComm_ErrorCode ECs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00197 
00198     int wcnt = 0, rcnt = 0;
00199 
00200         if (Flash->PageSize == 264)       // 4 and 8 Mbit
00201                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 9;
00202         else if (Flash->PageSize == 528)  // 16 and 32 Mbit
00203                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 10;
00204         else                              // 64 Mbit
00205                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 11;
00206     
00207         // Enable flash
00208     res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00209 
00210         // Opcode
00211     Wbuff[wcnt] = MAIN_MEM_PAGE_READ_CMD;
00212     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00213     ++wcnt;
00214         // Page address
00215     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>16) & 0xFF;
00216     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00217     ++wcnt;
00218     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>8) & 0xFF;
00219     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00220     ++wcnt;
00221     Wbuff[wcnt] = flash_addr & 0xFF;
00222     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00223     ++wcnt;
00224         // additional don't care bytes
00225     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00226         Wbuff[wcnt] = 0;
00227         Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00228         ++wcnt;
00229     }
00230 
00231     res |= CAENComm_MultiWrite32(Flash->Handle, Addrs, wcnt, Wbuff, ECs);
00232 
00233     // Read Flash Page
00234     rcnt = 0;
00235     for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++) {
00236         Addrs[rcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00237         ++rcnt;
00238     }
00239     res |= CAENComm_MultiRead32(Flash->Handle, Addrs, Flash->PageSize, Rbuff, ECs);
00240 
00241         // Disable flash 
00242     res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00243 
00244         // transfer the 32bit data buffer to the 8 bit buffer
00245         for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++)
00246                 data[i] = (uint8_t)Rbuff[i];
00247 
00248     return res;
00249 }

00252 static int ReadFlashPage16(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum)
00253 {
00254     unsigned int i;
00255     int res = 0;
00256     uint32_t flash_addr;
00257     uint16_t Wbuff[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];        // Buffers for the Multi Read/Write
00258     uint32_t Addrs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00259     uint16_t Rbuff[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00260     CAENComm_ErrorCode ECs[MAX_MULTIACCESS_BUFSIZE];
00261 
00262     int wcnt = 0, rcnt = 0;
00263 
00264         if (Flash->PageSize == 264)       // 4 and 8 Mbit
00265                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 9;
00266         else if (Flash->PageSize == 528)  // 16 and 32 Mbit
00267                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 10;
00268         else                              // 64 Mbit
00269                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 11;
00270     
00271         // Enable flash
00272     res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00273 
00274         // Opcode
00275     Wbuff[wcnt] = MAIN_MEM_PAGE_READ_CMD;
00276     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00277     ++wcnt;
00278         // Page address
00279     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>16) & 0xFF;
00280     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00281     ++wcnt;
00282     Wbuff[wcnt] = (flash_addr>>8) & 0xFF;
00283     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00284     ++wcnt;
00285     Wbuff[wcnt] = flash_addr & 0xFF;
00286     Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00287     ++wcnt;
00288         // additional don't care bytes
00289     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00290         Wbuff[wcnt] = 0;
00291         Addrs[wcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00292         ++wcnt;
00293     }
00294 
00295     // Send opcodes to flash
00296     res |= CAENComm_MultiWrite16(Flash->Handle, Addrs, wcnt, Wbuff, ECs);
00297 
00298     // Read Flash Page
00299     rcnt = 0;
00300     for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++) {
00301         Addrs[rcnt] = Flash->RW_Flash;
00302         ++rcnt;
00303     }
00304     res |= CAENComm_MultiRead16(Flash->Handle, Addrs, Flash->PageSize, Rbuff, ECs);
00305 
00306         // Disable flash 
00307     res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00308 
00309         // transfer the 32bit data buffer to the 8 bit buffer
00310         for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++)
00311                 data[i] = (uint8_t)Rbuff[i];
00312 
00313     return res;
00314 }

00316 static int ReadFlashSecurityReg32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data)
00317 {
00318   int i;
00319   int res = 0;
00320   uint32_t data32[2048];
00321 
00322   // enable flash (NCS = 0)
00323   res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);  
00324 
00325   // write opcode
00326   res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, AT45_READ_SECURITY_REGISTER_OPCODE);
00327   // additional don't care bytes
00328   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00329       res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, 0); 
00330 
00331   // read flash page
00332   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00333       res |= CAENComm_Read32(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash,(data32+i));
00334 
00335   // disable flash (NCS = 1)
00336   res |= CAENComm_Write32(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00337   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00338           data[i] = (uint8_t)data32[i];
00339 
00340   return res;
00341 }
00342 
00343 static int ReadFlashSecurityReg16(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data)
00344 {
00345   int i;
00346   int res = 0;
00347   uint16_t data16[2048];
00348 
00349   // enable flash (NCS = 0)
00350   res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, 0);  
00351 
00352   // write opcode
00353   res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, AT45_READ_SECURITY_REGISTER_OPCODE);
00354   // additional don't care bytes
00355   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00356       res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable); 
00357 
00358   // read flash page
00359   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00360       res |= CAENComm_Read16(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash,(data16+i));
00361 
00362   // disable flash (NCS = 1)
00363   res |= CAENComm_Write16(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00364   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00365           data[i] = (uint8_t)data16[i];
00366 
00367   return res;
00368 }

00372 // *****************************************************************************
00373 // WriteFlashPage: write one page of the flash memory
00374 // Parameters: data: pointer to the data buffer
00375 //             pagenum: flash page number
00376 // Return: 0 on Success, < 0 on error
00377 // *****************************************************************************
00378 int WriteFlashPage(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum) {
00379 
00380   int ret;
00381 
00382   if (Flash->RegSize == 4)
00383     ret = WriteFlashPage32(Flash, data, pagenum);
00384   else if (Flash->RegSize == 2)
00385     ret = WriteFlashPage16(Flash, data, pagenum); 
00386   else
00387     ret = CvUpgrade_FileAccessError; /* Unsupported RegSize */
00388 
00389   return ret;    
00390     
00391 }
00392 
00393 // *****************************************************************************
00394 // ReadFlashPage: read one page of the flash memory
00395 // Parameters: data: pointer to the data buffer
00396 //             pagenum: flash page number
00397 // Return: 0 on Success, < 0 on error
00398 // *****************************************************************************
00399 int ReadFlashPage(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum) {
00400 
00401   int ret;
00402 
00403   if (Flash->RegSize == 4)
00404     ret = ReadFlashPage32(Flash, data, pagenum);
00405   else if (Flash->RegSize == 2)
00406     ret = ReadFlashPage16(Flash, data, pagenum); 
00407   else
00408     ret = CvUpgrade_FileAccessError; /* Unsupported RegSize */
00409 
00410   return ret;    
00411     
00412 }
